Description: Fragment of coarse wool tapestry woven textile with some linen. The design is organized in bands. The main band has borders of multicoloured diamonds or squares on a blue ground and pink and brown stripes; on the left, are curling plant stems in green with an unrecognizable motif at centre and, on the right, are almond-shaped compartments framed in pink and brown and enclosing unrecognizable motifs in pink and blue. Above and below, poorly preserved, is a design predominantly in red, pink, blue and green.
